english.segment1: I'm forgiven because You were forsaken. I'm accepted, You were condemned. I'm alive and well. Your spirit is within me. Because You died and rose again
english.segment2: CHORUS: Amazing love, how can it be. That You my King, would die for me. Amazing love, I know it's true. It's my joy to honor You. In all I do I honor You
english.segment3: You are my King. You are my King. Jesus, You are my King. Jesus, You are my King
